com.icafe4j.image.writer

Class ImageWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.icafe4j.image.writer.ImageWriter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BMPWriter, GIFWriter, JPEGWriter, PNGWriter, TIFFWriter

    public abstract class ImageWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    The template class for other image writers This class defines a set of common data and methods for all image writers.
    Version:
    1.2 08/01/2013
    Author:
    Wen Yu, yuwen_66@yahoo.com

      • write

        protected abstract void write(int[] pixels,
                              int imageWidth,
                              int imageHeight,
                              java.io.OutputStream os)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        The actual image writing method to be implemented by any specific ImageWriter subclass
        Parameters:
        pixels - input image array in ARGB format
        imageWidth - image width
        imageHeight - image height
        os - OutputSteam to write the image
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
